      <path d="M701.4 125.974C702.765 125.381 703.78 124.845 703.78 123.951V109.265C703.78 107.778 703.244 106.942 700.985 106.471V104.984L708.418 102.247H709.668L709.904 105.098C711.984 103.376 714.542 102.247 717.637 102.247C723.583 102.247 726.499 105.813 726.499 110.037V123.951C726.499 124.902 727.449 125.381 729 125.974V127.46C727.628 127.46 724.183 127.339 723.404 127.339C722.632 127.339 719.302 127.46 717.994 127.46V125.974C719.359 125.381 720.374 124.845 720.374 123.951V112.059C720.374 107.836 719.009 105.935 715.321 105.935C713.242 105.935 711.276 106.885 709.911 109.029V123.958C709.911 124.909 710.862 125.388 712.406 125.981V127.467C711.041 127.467 707.589 127.346 706.817 127.346C706.045 127.346 702.715 127.467 701.407 127.467V125.974H701.4Z" fill="white"/>
    </symbol>

        <symbol viewBox="0 -0.5 17 17" class="asi-glyph asi-glyph-arrow-forward" id="arrow-forward-svgrepo-com" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      <path class="share-icon-path" fill="currentColor" fill-rule="evenodd" d="m15.584 5.988-5.24-4.645c-.404-.41-.879-.479-1.283-.068v3.132l-.227-.001c-4.95 0-8.75 3.563-8.75 8.41 0 1.688.766 1.073 1.083.484 1.501-2.78 4.267-4.677 7.705-4.677l.188.001v3.065c.404.41.929.361 1.283.068l5.24-4.283c.405-.41.405-1.075.001-1.486Z"/>
    </symbol>

    
        <symbol id="clock-svgrepo-com" viewBox="0 0 64 64" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      <path class="time-icon-path" fill="currentColor" d="M32 0C14.328 0 0 14.328 0 32s14.328 32 32 32 32-14.328 32-32S49.672 0 32 0zm10.844 42.844c-1.566 1.566-4.168 1.488-5.734-.078l-7.934-7.934a3.942 3.942 0 0 1-.867-1.305A3.95 3.95 0 0 1 28 32V16c0-2.211 1.789-4 4-4s4 1.789 4 4v14.344l6.859 6.859a3.977 3.977 0 0 1-.015 5.641z"/>
    </symbol>

        <symbol id="location-pin-svgrepo-com" viewBox="0 0 64 64" xml:space="preserve" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg">
      <path class="location-icon-path" fill="currentColor" d="M32 0C18.746 0 8 10.746 8 24c0 5.219 1.711 10.008 4.555 13.93.051.094.059.199.117.289l16 24a4.001 4.001 0 0 0 6.656 0l16-24c.059-.09.066-.195.117-.289C54.289 34.008 56 29.219 56 24 56 10.746 45.254 0 32 0zm0 32a8 8 0 1 1 0-16 8 8 0 0 1 0 16z"/>
    </symbol>

  </defs>
</svg>

    <main id="content" class="content top-level-page" tabindex="-1">
      
  
                                                    
<div class="topper topper--top-level topper--2-images">

  
  <div class="topper-hgroup">
    <h1 class="page-topper__h">Transformational education for lifelong learners.</h1>
    <p class="page-topper__intro">See what continuing your education can do for you.</p>
  </div>

      <div class="topper__image-group">
                                  <figure class="topper-asset-mod">
            
<div class="article-asset-mod">
  

      





    
    
  <div class="lazy-img__mod  article-asset  lazy-img__mod--white">
    <span class="lazy-img__placeholder" style="padding-top: 125%"></span>
    <img
      class="lazy-img lazyload "
      data-srcset="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/harvard-yard-gate.jpg 1200w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/harvard-yard-gate-240x300.jpg 240w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/harvard-yard-gate-819x1024.jpg 819w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/harvard-yard-gate-768x960.jpg 768w"
      data-src="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/harvard-yard-gate.jpg"
      alt="Johnston Gate at entrance to Harvard Yard"
      data-caption=""
      data-credit=""
    />
  </div>

  </div>
          </figure>
                                          <figure class="topper-asset-mod">
            
<div class="article-asset-mod">
  

      





    
    
  <div class="lazy-img__mod  article-asset  lazy-img__mod--white">
    <span class="lazy-img__placeholder" style="padding-top: 75%"></span>
    <img
      class="lazy-img lazyload "
      data-srcset="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/onege-maroadi.jpg 2000w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/onege-maroadi-300x225.jpg 300w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/onege-maroadi-1024x768.jpg 1024w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/onege-maroadi-768x576.jpg 768w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/onege-maroadi-1536x1152.jpg 1536w"
      data-src="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/onege-maroadi.jpg"
      alt="Onege Maroadi standing outside a building at Harvard University"
      data-caption=""
      data-credit=""
    />
  </div>

  </div>
          </figure>
                  </div>
  
</div>

  <article class="basic-page__body">

    <div class="basic-page__body-width js-hang-punc">
      
<p>Welcome to the Division of Continuing Education (DCE), where lifelong learning is at the core of everything we do. We are a division of Harvard University dedicated to bringing rigorous programs and innovative online teaching capabilities to distance learners, working professionals, high school students, and those seeking higher learning in retirement.</p>



<p>World-class faculty and instructors and a global network of peers engage you in and out of the classroom. Flexible programming helps you make continuing education a priority, no matter your lifestyle. Make Harvard’s tradition of academic excellence part of your journey.</p>



<div class="dce-block dce-block__card-list dce-block__card-list--has-images">
  <div class="dce-block__card-list-inner">

          <h2 class="card-list__heading">Explore Your Opportunities at Harvard</h2>
    
    <ul class="card-list__list card-list__list--4">
                        <li class="card-list__item">
            <a href="https://extension.harvard.edu/" class="card-list__link">
              <h3 class="card-list__item-heading">Harvard Extension School</h3>
                              <p class="card-list__item-description">Harvard degrees, certificates and courses—online, in the evenings, and at your own pace.</p>
                                            <div class="card-list__art">
                  <figure class="card-list__figure">
                    <img decoding="async" src="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/tall-extension-600x900-c-default.jpg" class="card-list__img" alt="A student in a classroom.">
                  </figure>
                </div>
                            <svg class="card-list__arrow-icon">
                <use href="#arrow-right" xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use>
              </svg>
            </a>
          </li>
                                <li class="card-list__item">
            <a href="https://summer.harvard.edu/" class="card-list__link">
              <h3 class="card-list__item-heading">Harvard Summer School</h3>
                              <p class="card-list__item-description">Academic summer opportunities for adult, college and high school students—at Harvard and abroad.</p>
                                            <div class="card-list__art">
                  <figure class="card-list__figure">
                    <img decoding="async" src="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/students-tall-summer-600x900-c-default.jpg" class="card-list__img" alt="Young students in a library.">
                  </figure>
                </div>
                            <svg class="card-list__arrow-icon">
                <use href="#arrow-right" xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use>
              </svg>
            </a>
          </li>
                                <li class="card-list__item">
            <a href="https://professional.dce.harvard.edu/" class="card-list__link">
              <h3 class="card-list__item-heading">Professional &amp; Executive Development</h3>
                              <p class="card-list__item-description">Short, intensive programs to develop skills and strengthen your professional profile.</p>
                                            <div class="card-list__art">
                  <figure class="card-list__figure">
                    <img decoding="async" src="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/parent-tall-5-600x900-c-default.png" class="card-list__img" alt="A student in his professional environment.">
                  </figure>
                </div>
                            <svg class="card-list__arrow-icon">
                <use href="#arrow-right" xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use>
              </svg>
            </a>
          </li>
                                <li class="card-list__item">
            <a href="https://hilr.dce.harvard.edu/" class="card-list__link">
              <h3 class="card-list__item-heading">Harvard Institute for Learning in Retirement</h3>
                              <p class="card-list__item-description">Active intellectual engagement designed for and by retired and semi-retired professionals.</p>
                                            <div class="card-list__art">
                  <figure class="card-list__figure">
                    <img decoding="async" src="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2020/08/test-hilr-600x900-c-default.png" class="card-list__img" alt="An HILR student in a suit.">
                  </figure>
                </div>
                            <svg class="card-list__arrow-icon">
                <use href="#arrow-right" xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use>
              </svg>
            </a>
          </li>
                  </ul>

  </div>
</div>





<div class="dce-block dce-block__multi-stat  dce-block__multi-stat--has-image">
      <div class="dce-block__multi-stat-inner ">
      <div class="multi-stat__content">
                    <ul class="multi-stat__list multi-stat__list--6">
                                    <li class="multi-stat__item">
                <p class="multi-stat__item-stat">70 degrees &#038; certificates</p>
                                  <p class="multi-stat__item-description">Harvard Extension School</p>
                              </li>
                                                <li class="multi-stat__item">
                <p class="multi-stat__item-stat">110 years</p>
                                  <p class="multi-stat__item-description">Distance education trailblazers</p>
                              </li>
                                                <li class="multi-stat__item">
                <p class="multi-stat__item-stat">120</p>
                                  <p class="multi-stat__item-description">Professional &#038; Executive Development programs</p>
                              </li>
                                                <li class="multi-stat__item">
                <p class="multi-stat__item-stat">60 countries </p>
                                  <p class="multi-stat__item-description">Harvard Summer School</p>
                              </li>
                                                <li class="multi-stat__item">
                <p class="multi-stat__item-stat">29,000</p>
                                  <p class="multi-stat__item-description">Harvard Extension Alumni Association members</p>
                              </li>
                                                <li class="multi-stat__item">
                <p class="multi-stat__item-stat">550 members</p>
                                  <p class="multi-stat__item-description">Harvard Institute for Learning in Retirement</p>
                              </li>
                              </ul>
          </div>

          <div class="multi-stat__art">
        <figure class="multi-stat__figure">
          
  




    
    
  <div class="lazy-img__mod  multi-stat__img lazy-img__mod--white">
    <span class="lazy-img__placeholder" style="padding-top: 66.4%"></span>
    <img
      class="lazy-img lazyload "
      data-srcset="https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/veritas-shield.jpg 2000w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/veritas-shield-300x199.jpg 300w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/veritas-shield-1024x680.jpg 1024w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/veritas-shield-768x510.jpg 768w, https://dce.harvard.edu/wp-content/uploads/2021/02/veritas-shield-1536x1020.jpg 1536w"

  </div>

    </div>
  </article>


        </main>

        
          
<footer class="footer">
  <div class="footer-section footer-section--light">
          <div class="footer-section__content footer-section__content--cta">
        <div class="footer__main-cta">
          <div class="footer__main-cta__content">
                        <h2 class="footer__main-cta__title">The Division of Continuing Education</h2>
                                    <div class="footer__main-cta__intro"><p>A catalyst that amplifies your learning with practical knowledge gained from Harvard instructors and classroom peers.</p>
</div>
                        <div class="footer__main-cta__btn-wrapper">
                                        </div>
          </div>
        </div>

        <div class="footer__art">
          <figure class="footer__art-figure">

<section class="footer-section footer-section--dark">

  <div class="footer-section__content">
    <div class="footer__about-dce-hgroup">
      <h2 class="footer__about-dce__title">
        <a href="https://dce.harvard.edu" class="footer__about-dce__title-link">Harvard Division of Continuing Education</a>
      </h2>
    </div>
    <div class="footer__about-dce__desc">
      <p class="footer__about-dce__desc__text">
        The Division of Continuing Education (DCE) at Harvard University is dedicated to bringing rigorous academics and innovative teaching capabilities to those seeking to improve their lives through education. We make Harvard education accessible to lifelong learners from high school to retirement.
      </p>
    </div>

    <nav class="footer__schools" aria-label="Schools Navigation">
      <ul class="footer__school-list">
        <li class="footer__school-list-item">
          <h3 class="footer__school-title">
            <a href="https://extension.harvard.edu" class="footer__school-title-link">
              <span class="footer__school-title-text">Harvard Extension School</span>
              <svg class="footer__school-title-arrow-icon" aria-hidden="true">
                <use href="#arrow-right" xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use>
              </svg>
            </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="footer__school-desc">Harvard degrees, certificates and courses—online, in the evenings, and at your own pace.</p>
        </li>
        <li class="footer__school-list-item">
          <h3 class="footer__school-title">
            <a href="https://summer.harvard.edu" class="footer__school-title-link">
              <span class="footer__school-title-text">Harvard Summer School</span>
              <svg class="footer__school-title-arrow-icon" aria-hidden="true">
                <use href="#arrow-right" xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use>
              </svg>
            </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="footer__school-desc">Academic summer opportunities for adult, college and high school students—at Harvard and abroad.</p>
        </li>
        <li class="footer__school-list-item">
          <h3 class="footer__school-title">
            <a href="https://professional.dce.harvard.edu" class="footer__school-title-link">
              <span class="footer__school-title-text">Harvard Professional &amp; Executive Development</span>
              <svg class="footer__school-title-arrow-icon" aria-hidden="true">
                <use href="#arrow-right" xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use>
              </svg>
            </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="footer__school-desc">Short, intensive programs to develop skills and strengthen your professional profile.</p>
        </li>
        <li class="footer__school-list-item">
          <h3 class="footer__school-title">
            <a href="https://hilr.dce.harvard.edu" class="footer__school-title-link">
              <span class="footer__school-title-text">Harvard Institute for Learning in Retirement</span>
              <svg class="footer__school-title-arrow-icon" aria-hidden="true">
                <use href="#arrow-right" xlink:href="#arrow-right"></use>
              </svg>
            </a>
          </h3>
          <p class="footer__school-desc">Peer learning in the liberal arts—a community program for retired and semi-retired professionals.</p>
        </li>
      </ul>
    </nav>
  </div>

  <div class="footer-section__utility">
    <div class="footer-section__utility-wrapper">
      <div class="footer__logo">
        <a href="https://dce.harvard.edu" class="footer__logo-link">
          <span class="visually-hidden">Harvard Division of Continuing Education</span>
          <svg class="footer__logo-svg" width="729" height="159">

          </div>
        </a>
      </div>
